name: Traffic Smart - Adthena

overview:
Adthena is an ingenious and the most comprehensive Competitor Intelligence for Search solution that provides you with the complete landscape of both relevant competitors and relevant keywords. This means that you have a comprehensive view of your whole market. Base your search strategy on accurate competitor performance data, and you donâ€™t miss an opportunity or threat

Competitive intelligence is a familiar concept. Adthena combines that familiarity with a unique methodology that uses cutting edge, patent-pending technology to deliver the most in-depth and thorough results available for benchmarking, campaign improvement and infringement monitoring.

Rather than settling for pre-packaged batches of industry-wide data, or having to painstakingly choose only a few keywords to represent your vertical, this application automatically reports on the competitive landscape relevant to each client site, with a minimum of input and effort demanded from the marketer. Simply specify your domain name, and let Adthenaâ€™s wisdom do the rest.

Whether looking at your whole market, or drilling down to different keyword subsets or competitors, the information revealed will turn into actions that help you shave costs and improve campaign performance, whilst also increasing efficiency.
